#quotes Satisfaction does not come with achievement, but with effort. Full effort is full victory. Mahatma Gandhi.
Regard it as just as desirable to build a chicken house as to build a cathedral. Frank Lloyd Wright
The outer conditions of a person's life will always be found to reflect their inner beliefs - James Allen
Only stretch your foot to the length of your blanket. Afghan Proverb
Appearances aren't everything.AmericanProverb
An ounce of discretion is worth a pound of wit.AmericanProverb
A drowning man grabs at a straw.AmericanProverb
A slip of the foot and you may soon recover, but a slip of the tongue you may never get over.AmericanProverb
Death devours lambs as well as sheep. AmericanProverb
#quotes In business, one of the challenges is making sure that your product is the easiest to experience and complete a sale.
#quotes In a time of crisis we all have the potential to morph up to a new level and do things we never thought possible.
There's no ceiling on effort! Harvey C. Fruehauf
#quotes We provide food that customers love, day after day after day. People just want more of it.
#quotes Surviving a failure gives you more self-confidence. Failures are great learning tools.. but they must be kept to a minimum.
#quotes The more you express gratitude for what you have the more you will have to express gratitude for.
#quotes You've got to look for a gap, where competitors in a market have grown lazy and lost contact with the readers or the viewers.
Adversity cause some men to break; others to break records. William A. Ward
#quotes I enjoy my work so much that I have to be pulled away from my work into leisure.
He who dares... Wins! British SAS motto
#quotes Each Wal-Mart store should reflect the values of its customers and support the vision they hold for their community
#quotes If Im going to do something, I do it spectacularly or I dont do it at all.
Stand up to your obstacles and do something about them. You will find that they haven't half the strength you think they have. Norman Vincen
#quotes When buying shares, ask yourself, would you buy the whole company?
Special Olympics Motto Let me win, but if I cannot win, let me be brave in the attempt.
#quotes The art of leadership is saying no, not yes. It is very easy to say yes.
Share our similarities, celebrate our differences. M. Scott Peck
#quotes Don't let anyone say you can't do it.
#quotes Hell, there are no rules here, we're trying to accomplish something.
Bad to do evil, but worse to boast about it. AmericanProverb
Debt is the worst kind of poverty. AmericanProverb
A cloudy day is no match for a sunny disposition. William Arthur Ward
#quotes The good things take care of themselves. We want to find all the negatives.
Achieving starts with believing. Unknown Author
#quotes Achievement is largely the product of steadily raising one's levels of aspiration . . and expectation.
#quotes Kids go where there is excitement. They stay where there is love. Zig Ziglar
Just play. Have fun. Enjoy the game. Michael Jordan
#quotes We believe ranchers and farmers and family business owners can make better decisions about the future than the government can.
Use what talent you possess, the woods would be very silent if no birds sang except those that sang best. Henry Van Dyke
#quotes Technology is always evolving, and companies.. not just search companies.. can't be afraid to take advantage of change.
My great concern is not whether you have failed, but whether you are content with your failure.
#quotes You can finish school, and even make it easy -but you never finish your education,and it's seldom easy.
#quotes We have bloated bureaucracies in Corporate America. The root of the problem is the absence of real corporate democracy.
You can get everything in life you want if you will just help enough other people get what they want. Zig Ziglar
#quotes Anything's possible if you've got enough nerve.
If you're not going to play to win, you might as well hold the Olympics in someone's back yard. Jessie Owens
#quotes Leaders need to be optimists. Their vision is beyond the present.
Courtesy on one side only never lasts for long. AmericanProverb
The fastest way to succeed is to look as if you're playing by somebody else's rules, while quietly playing by your own. Michael Korda
Whether it rains or stops raining, the lentils have two eyes Afghan Proverb
That some achieve great success, is proof to all that others can achieve it as well. Abe Lincoln
#quotes Everyone is trying to accomplish something big, not realizing that life is made up of little things.
Age lasts; youth devours.AmericanProverb
#quotes Management is nothing more than motivating other people.
#quotes Wallowing in the past may be good literature. As wisdom, it's hopeless.
If you listen to your fears, you will die never knowing what a great person you might have been. Robert H. Schuller
A house divided against itself cannot stand. Abe Lincoln
#quotes Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
#quotes What a man believes may be ascertained not from his creed, but from assumptions on which he habitually acts.
Beauty without virtue is a rose without fragrance. AmericanProverb
#quotes A happy man is too satisfied with the present to dwell too much on the future.
#quotes I'm not a sponge exactly, but I find that something I look at is a great opportunity for ideas.
You've got to say, I think that if I keep working at this and want it badly enough I can have it. It's called perseverance. Lee Iacocca
Nothing builds self-esteem and self-confidence like accomplishment. Thomas Carlyle
Character is what we are; reputation is what others think we are. AmericanProverb
#quotes Your best teacher is your last mistake.
WHEN PEOPLE YOU WORK WITH DO THEIR JOB TO MAKE THINGS RIGHT & STILL HAVE TIME TO SMILE& GET ALONG WITH OTHERS, I WANT THEM AROUND JOHN WAYNE

You dont become enormously successful without encountering and overcoming a number of extremely challenging problems. Mark Victor Hansen

Setting an example is not the main means of influencing another, it is the only means. Albert Einstein
#quotes The most important adage and the only adage is, the customer comes first, whatever the business, the customer comes first.
What's the worst thing that can happen to a quarterback? He loses his confidence. Terry Bradshaw
Intellectual growth should commence at birth and cease only at death Albert Einstein
#quotes What good is money if it can't inspire terror in your fellow man?
Failure doesn't mean you are a failure it just means you haven't succeeded yet. Robert H. Schuller
If you can count your money, you don't have a billion dollars. J. Paul Getty
#quotes Fear melts when you take action towards a goal you really want.
